name: csv4latex
short_description:
This project is about to start.

For all the ones who need a conversion now see csvtolatex at <https://sourceforge.net/projects/csvtolatex/>.

Here is the description:

csv4latex converts csv-tables created by a spreadsheet software like MS Excel, Libre Office or Open Office Calc to a LaTeX table code you can directly include in your LaTeX-code using \input{}.

This program is for everyone using LaTeX and tables like measurement scales, where the tables can be changed from time to time. Like changing an equation to evaluate.

This program is not designed for learning how to create a table in LaTeX.

This program could be compatible with MS Win 2k or Win ME, but this has to be tested.

If you want to be informed when the first version is online, the please send me an e-mail to <csv4latex@t-online.de>.
summary: converts csv-files created by MS Excel, LibreOffice/OO calc to LaTeX
